text: Edge and Christian (E&C;) was a professional wrestling tag team. The team was made up of legit (real life) best friends Edge and Christian. Edge and Christian are best known for competing in World Wrestling Federation/Entertainment (WWE). During their time as a tag team, they were able to win the WWF Tag Team Championship on seven different occasions. They were first portrayed as on-screen brothers during the mid-2000s but that was later fazed out and they were announced as childhood friends in 2010. The team split up in 2001 and reunited for a short while in 2011 but it ended after Edge had to announce to his retirement due to a neck injury on the April 11 episode of Monday Night Raw. They were also known for competing in TLC matches (TLC matches) where they competed in the very first one at SummerSlam and defeated The Hardy Boyz (Matt and Jeff) and The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von). == Championships == *Insane Championship Wrestling **ICW Streetfight Tag Team Championship (one time) *Pro Wrestling Illustrated **PWI Match of the Year (2000) (vs. The Dudley Boyz and The Hardy Boyz in a Triangle Ladder match at WrestleMania 2000) **PWI Match of the Year (2001) (vs. The Dudley Boyz and The Hardy Boyz in a TLC match at WrestleMania X-Seven) *World Wrestling Federation/Entertainment **World Heavyweight Championship (two times) (Edge (one) and Christian (one)) **WWF Intercontinental Championship (two times) (Edge (two)) **WWF Light Heavyweight Championship (one time) (Christian) **World Tag Team Championship (seven times) **King of the Ring (2001) (Edge) *Wrestling Observer Newsletter **Tag Team of the Year (2000) ==References== == Other websites == *Edge's WWE profile *Christian's WWE profile Category:WWE teams and stables Category:1998 establishments Category:2011 disestablishments
